channel.title: Infected Pvm 718
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/UL4mIBV.png[/img]
[url=http://www.mediafire.com/download/5ptcm081wfo8p8t/Infected+Pvm.jar]Infected Pvm Client[/url] [url=http://www.infectedpvm.com]Infected Pvm Website[/url]
[B]Welcome to Infected Pvm Advertisement, We are Currently Still Developing and adding Content Daily, we are a Pvm/eco/pvp Server, If you enjoy Bossing with friends and wrecking other players in pvp! Then Join us Today![/B]
Features: Double xp + loot Weekends ( rare Occasions for double loot ) Livid Farming Farming Locations all over Runescape. Highscores System Custom quests Auto vote System Unique Auto Donation System Auto Donator Rank system Donation Shops Ingame Prestige system + Bonus xp per Prestige level. Bonus xp ring Custom Donator boss Vip zone+ Boss Donator Zone + Ext Donator Boss Drygore Weapons Primal/Sag/Celest Gears + Weapons Great Community Tetsu Armour/Kalphite armour Skilling points system Pvm point system Server Veteran System ( 10hrs of gameplay ) Comp Cape Requirments Troll invasion Old School Looks/ pre eoc looks Custom Skilling animations Off-Hand Weapons All skills Trainable All Advance Agility courses Wilderness Agility Course Money pouch Custom Gambler 80% Glacors Combat system to Rs Custom barrow gloves system Loyalty System - All Aura's Clue Scrolls 4 Donator Ranks Each recieve Bonus xp
Infected Pvm Mini-Games - Working Castle wars + Rewards - Dominion Tower - Working + Rewards - Barrows - Duel Arena - Fight Caves + Fight kiln - Warrior guild - Defenders Currently Adding Pest Control + Soul wars.
Infected Pvm Bosses - Bork - Thunderous - Blink - PartyDemon - Roc - Wolverine - Mutated Wolverine - ice troll king - Avatar of Destruction - Giant Mole - All of Gwd Including nex - Kalphite queen - Qbd & Kbd - Lucien - Tormented Demons - Sunfreet - Dks - Corporal Beast + many others!
[SPOILER=Few Boss Pictures] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/NrLzuLp.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/4pBbRy5.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/EjrY2A4.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/4MYgSrk.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/STCRAs4.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/TtClgu6.png[/img]
[/SPOILER] Infected Pvm Dungeons - Polypore Dungeon re done - Jadinko Lair all npc Drops according to Runescape. - Slayer tower - Glacors - Rev Cave ( Pk Area also ) - Brimhaven Dungeon - 3x Custom Dungeons - Frost Dragon Dungeon - 2x More Dungeons Currently being added in
[SPOILER=Content] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Wrr4N8N.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/p0XPcuA.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/okFykvv.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/SNipzye.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/3hBcCP8.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/70H3u9y.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Y9Ls28b.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/MbtlVPg.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/1znniF2.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/KxW3CRe.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/CSz5azI.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/OClDvi1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/4Oc3JaY.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/U3QqFtg.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/W4wtelC.png[/img]
[/SPOILER][/CENTER]
